title: electronic
description: Electronic music is a genre that encompasses a wide range of styles and sounds, primarily produced using electronic devices and technology. It includes subgenres such as house, techno, trance, drum and bass, and dubstep, among others. Electronic music is characterized by its use of synthesizers, drum machines, and sequencers to create rhythmic and melodic compositions. It has evolved significantly since its inception in the mid-20th century, influencing popular music and culture worldwide.
